meanings.sent1: The story was ultrafamiliar to everyone in the town.
meanings.sent2: The song was ultrafamiliar to all the students.
meanings.sent3: The ultrafamiliar joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her face was ultrafamiliar, like a memory from childhood.
meanings.sent5: The ultrafamiliar smell of fresh cookies filled the room.
